description:
Client is a single parent of 2 children, a 13-year-old daughter and a 10-year-old son who is diagnosed with autism, non-verbal and fully dependent on client for daily activities such as feeding, bathing, and other personal care. Client has been the sole breadwinner of the family and has only been able to explore ad-hoc employment in view that she is the sole caregiver to her son.

Client is hoping to seek interim diapers assistance for her son whilst exploring sustainable alternatives with formal supports in alleviating the financial and caregiving stress that she has been experiencing.  

Quantity: 4-8 packs of Pamper Sensi Night Pants Junior Children's Diapers Pants 4XL

name: Sofa
description:
hii all! The household consists of two parents and their 9‑year‑old daughter. The father is the sole breadwinner, while both the mother and daughter are coping with ongoing health issues that limit the family’s capacity to manage daily needs. The family’s current wardrobe has deteriorated to the point of rotting, attracting cockroaches and posing hygiene concerns. Their sofa was also disposed of months ago after becoming unusable, leaving them without proper seating at home. Given their financial constraints and health challenges, the family would greatly benefit from support to obtain a new wardrobe and sofa to ensure safe, dignified, and functional living conditions.

name: Commode
description:
Request assistance for a brand new commode for an elderly lady from a family of three, consisting of two elderly parents and an adult daughter.

The daughter is the full-time caregiver for both parents and is unable to work, hence the family currently has no source of income and is surviving on their savings. The existing commode is no longer suitable, and a replacement is urgently needed due to hygiene concerns.

If the request is feasible, please WhatsApp me at 8800 3073 and I can provide an image or Shopee link of the suitable commode. Delivery can be made directly to the family’s address.

passiton.name: Mobile Mini Shower Commode (Fixed Armrests)
passiton.description:
This is a compact 3-in-1 mobility aid for narrow spaces. Please read the condition notes below carefully before requesting.

Condition:
* Status: Well used (since August 2023).
* Maintenance: Stainless steel frame is rust-free. The wheels still swivel smoothly.
* Hygiene: Thoroughly cleaned and disinfected.

Defects (Please Read):
* Wheel Lock: The lock on one of the wheels is spoiled. The other three wheels still lock, but please use with caution.
* Seat Condition: There is a small tear along the seam of the soft PU seat.

Specifications:
* Seat W x D: 15.5" x 16.5" (39.5 x 42 cm)
* Seat height: 19.75" (50 cm)
* Overall height: 37.5" (95 cm)
* Overall width: 20.7" (52.5 cm)
* Wheel size: 4" swivel wheel casters
* Product weight: 9.6 kg (Fixed Armrests)
* Weight capacity: 100 kg
* Material: Stainless steel (frame), PU (seat, backrest, armrest)
* To roll over toilet bowl, ensure height is less than 15.5" (39.5 cm) and width is less than 16" (41 cm)
passiton.location: Eunos, Geylang, Kembangan, Paya Lebar , Sims

name: Walking frame
description: Client is divorced and living alone. Limited social and financial support. His daughter seldom involved in his care and does not provide financial support. Client recently had a fall leading to left hip fracture and on non- weight bearing status. He has difficulty with ambulation and attending TCU due to the lack of appropriate walking aids and wheelchair. Unable to purchase proper equipment due to financial constraint.

name: Tablet
description:
"The client is the primary caregiver for her two school-going teenage children. She is currently medically unfit for work due to physical and mental health concerns and is in the midst of divorce proceedings. At present, she has no source of income. Despite her financial challenges, the client continues to meet household expenses and provide for her children through external family support and donations. 

The client is seeking assistance for a tablet to support her children’s educational needs. The device is necessary for school assignments, accessing online learning platforms, and completing home-based learning tasks. Due to her lack of income and ongoing financial strain, she is unable to afford a laptop on her own. For further information, please contact Seelvi at 8699 3152 or via email at seelvi.nadarasan@thkmc.org.sg. Thank you."

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Tanjong Pagar
contact.name: Norlizawati Binte Hamid
